elements.label: Bittersweet Memory
elements.description: I could recall a complex time.

elements.label: Pleasant Memory
elements.description: I could recall a happier time.

elements.label: Passionate Memory
elements.description: I could recall a warmer time.

elements.label: Something Shameful
elements.description: Not all private pleasures are suitable for public discussion.

elements.label: Something Profitable
elements.description: A ray of commercial light; a miniature opportunity; a figurative five-pound note on the pavement.

elements.label: Something Joyful
elements.description: Delight does not endure for long, but sometimes, it endures longer than do we.

elements.label: Something Menacing
elements.description: The great mercy of dreams is that they do not often intrude into waking life.

elements.label: Something Unexpected
elements.description: Every life has its impossible corners.

elements.label: Furious Memory
elements.description: Long after the cause for rage has passed, the rage endures. Here is a memory of a wrong done before ever iron was tamed. [Paint with this Memory to bring it to full awareness.]

elements.label: Luxurious Memory
elements.description: Pleasure, like the sea, is ancient; pleasure, like the sea, precedes the conscious human soul; but like the sea, pleasure is different in every age and every hour. [Paint with this Memory to bring it to full awareness.]

elements.label: Liminal Memory
elements.description: 'We each of us have a memory of a moment when things changed forever, though at the time we never knew it. Perhaps the world also has those memories.' [Paint with this Memory to bring it to full awareness.]

elements.label: Glorious Memory
elements.description: The Sun was warmer once - no brighter, but its touch was a kind of mercy. [Paint with this Memory to bring it to full awareness.]

elements.label: Splendid Memory
elements.description: The Sun was brighter once - no warmer, but its light held colours we no longer see. [Paint with this Memory to bring it to full awareness.]

elements.label: Endless Memory
elements.description: There is a Wheel that only turns beneath the Moon, where once it turned beneath the Sun. But why only one? Why only two? [Paint with this Memory to bring it to full awareness.]

elements.label: Wildering Memory
elements.description: Sometimes we remember what was lost even when we have forgotten that it is gone. [Paint with this Memory to bring it to full awareness.]

elements.label: Golden Memory
elements.description: In fire are all the treasures of the earth revealed. [Paint with this Memory to bring it to full awareness.]

elements.label: Honeyed Memory
elements.description: When we walked in the ways of the wood we were winged and watchful, and we had no need of nectar. [Paint with this Memory to bring it to full awareness.]
